Parameters: MediaPlayer: the MediaPlayer associated with this callback
MediaPlayer.DrmInfo: DRM info of the source including PSSH, and subset of crypto schemes supported by this device
onDrmInfo(android.media.MediaPlayer,andr.Description: Called to indicate DRM info is available
onDrmInfo(android.media.MediaPlayer,andr.FullName: public abstract void onDrmInfo (MediaPlayer mp, MediaPlayer.DrmInfo drmInfo)

ClassDesc: Interface definition of a callback to be invoked when the DRM info becomes available
